name: Sumpys Adventures Platformers
description: This is a platformer, you just have to solve a few hard levels and win, these are challenging levels, the readme says more too, anyways ever wanted tough platformers that are next to impossible to beat? either that your too good or you wanna prank your friends? either way these are hard challenges, you need to be extremely good to win, there is no checkpoints meaning if you mess up at any point before completion then you gotta start from beginning! Koodos to anyone who makes an A.I. that can play either of them or both! The Intro platformer is just something I did to say hi as this is a new field of genre for me to be making but anywho enough talking your head off enjoy the game/challenges!
